invent.h File Reference

Include file for inventory functions. More...

#include "invent.c"

Data Structures

struct  INVITEM
 Definition of an inventory item. More...
struct  INVENTORY
 Definition of an inventory. More...

Defines

#define INVENT_ACTIVE
 This define can be evaluated to check if this module is included and active.
Configuration Data
The values of these parameters can be overwritten by defining them before including this file.

#define INV_PANELDIST   5
 Distance between inventory panel and screen border.
#define INV_FADESPEED   25
 Fading speed for show/hide of inventory (= INV_ALPHA/(fadetime*16).
#define INV_ALPHA   90
 Maximum alpha value of inventory.
#define INV_SCALE   1.0
 Maximum scale value of inventory.
Constant Data
These constants are used as parameters for certain functions.

#define INV_UNLIMITEDITEMS   0
#define INV_UNLIMITEDWEIGHT   0
#define INV_UNLIMITEDAMOUNT   0
#define INV_ALIGN_LEFT   1
#define INV_ALIGN_RIGHT   2
#define INV_ALIGN_TOP   4
#define INV_ALIGN_BOTTOM   8

Detailed Description

Include file for inventory functions.

Function Documentation

var INVENTORY_add ( INVENTORY *  psInv,
INVITEM *  psItem 
)

Add new item to inventory.

Item needs to be created with INVITEM_create first.

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY
psItem Pointer to INVITEM to be added
Returns:
1: item added 0: item not added

INVENTORY* INVENTORY_create ( STRING *  strBmap,
var  vLayer 
)

Creates new Inventory.

Initialize a new inventory with the given background bitmap and the given layer.

Parameters:
strBmap file name of background bitmap
vLayer layer value of inventory panels
Returns:
Pointer to INVENTORY structure

INVITEM* INVENTORY_getItem ( INVENTORY *  psInv  ) 

Get pointer to currently selected inventory item.

Delivers the selected item as INVITEM object.

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY
Returns:
Pointer to INVITEM object structure

void INVENTORY_hide ( INVENTORY *  psInv  ) 

Hide Inventory from screen.

Inventory will smoothly fade out. Fade speed depends on INV_FADESPEED and INV_ALPHA

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY

var INVENTORY_isVisible ( INVENTORY *  psInv  ) 

Check whether inventory is visible.

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY
Returns:
0: invisible 1: visible

void INVENTORY_next ( INVENTORY *  psInv  ) 

Switch to next item in inventory.

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY

void INVENTORY_prev ( INVENTORY *  psInv  ) 

Switch to previous item in inventory.

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY

void INVENTORY_remove ( INVENTORY *  psInv  ) 

Removes an Inventory.

Frees all memory previously allocated by the given inventory.

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY

INVITEM* INVENTORY_searchItem ( INVENTORY *  psInv,
long  lItemId 
)

Get pointer to first item with given item id.

Delivers found item as INVITEM object.

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY
lItemId item id
Returns:
Pointer to INVITEM object structure

void INVENTORY_setPos ( INVENTORY *  psInv,
var  vX,
var  vY,
var  vAlign 
)

set position of inventory window.

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY
vX x Position on screen
vY y Position on screen
vAlign Bit mask of INV_ALIGN_xx

void INVENTORY_setSize ( INVENTORY *  psInv,
var  vMaxItems,
var  vMaxWeight,
var  vMaxAmount 
)

Set max number of items and max weight per inventory and max amount of single item.

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY
vMaxItems Max number of items (0 -> unlimited)
vMaxWeight Max weight of all items (0 -> unlimited)
vMaxAmount Max amount of single item (0 -> unlimited)

void INVENTORY_show ( INVENTORY *  psInv  ) 

Show Inventory on screen.

Inventory will smoothly fade in. Fade speed depends on INV_FADESPEED and INV_ALPHA

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY

void INVENTORY_sub ( INVENTORY *  psInv  ) 

Use/drop currently selected inventory item.

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY

void INVENTORY_updatePos ( INVENTORY *  psInv  ) 

Recalculate inventory position.

(call on resolution change)

Parameters:
psInv Pointer to affected INVENTORY

INVITEM* INVITEM_create ( STRING *  strBmap,
long  lItemId,
var  vWeight,
var  vAmount 
)

Creates new inventory item and sets Item Bitamp, Item id and item weight.

Parameters:
strBmap File name of item bitmap
lItemId Item Identifier
vWeight Item weight
vAmount Item amount
Returns:
Pointer to INVITEM structure

Get amount of given inventory item.

Parameters:

Returns:

Get weight of given INVITEM.

Parameters:
psItem Pointer to INVITEM
Returns:
Item weight

void INVITEM_setExtension ( INVITEM *  psItem,
void *  psExt,
void *  pfExtRemove 
)

Update amount, stackable and custom struct of given inventory item.

Parameters:
psItem Pointer to INVITEM
psExt Pointer to item extension (custom struct for storing additional information)
pfExtRemove Pointer to item extension removal function (function parameter: pointer to extension object, type void*)

void INVITEM_setStackable ( INVITEM *  psItem,
var  vStackable 
)

Update stackable parameter of given inventory item.

Parameters:
psItem pointer to INVITEM
vStackable 1: item is stackable 0: item is not stackable
